title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 124.7 - Penalties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 124.7 - Penalties

State Regulations
(a) After a guilty
finding, the administrative law judge may impose any penalty authorized by the

Vehicle and Traffic Law, including suspension or revocation of a driver's
license and/or motor vehicle registration, but not including
imprisonment. (b) The
administrative law judge will inform the motorist of any penalty imposed and of
the right to appeal a finding of guilty. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
124.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
